name: RED EYE (itch)
description:
Arrows control the plane. Pick up passengers. Drop them off. Demons and rocks make you lose passengers. If you don't have the security of passengers to lose, each collision slightly rearranges your surroundings.

NB. I was in a mad rush to get this playable before heading back to work, so there may be some weird glitches towards the end of the game. I mean, the whole point is the game glitches as you play and rearranges itself, but the bad glitches should be pretty evident. I hope haha 

I intend to polish it off within this next week, but for now this is probably 95% complete!

Made for https://itch.io/jam/a-game-by-its-cover-2018 

--------------

Inspired by RED EYE famicom design by Brent Ashe [http://famicase.com/18/softs/112.html] 

Uses this screen effect: https://blokatt.itch.io/bktglitch 

I completely forgot to add active links to the credits in-game, whoops!
